name: Fun Family Outing
description:
This family would like a relaxing day in the city, unaware that it has been overrun with zombies. It is your job to take care of the zombies as the hordes grow, and let the family enjoy their day in peace.

Use the arrow keys to move, touch the zombies to destroy them. Press the Spacebar to enter a car and run the zombies over, or even block the roads.
